channel.title: Banking
channel.description: Can anyone tell me a command for banking. I know ::bank which is for only owner. No admins nor mods can use it. Also theres to ("banks") in the client.java. Please help?

item.title: Banking
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

-.- No that doesnt help i tryed that.

} // else if (command.startsWith("bank")) // if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) // { // sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); // } // else // { // openUpBank(); // } Thats what it is now.
Ive done this:

} // else if (command.startsWith("bank") && playerRights >= 2) { // if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) // { // sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); // } // else // { // openUpBank(); // }
I need a code for admins and mods only.

Read full topic

item.title: Banking
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Change playerRights == 3 to playerRights >= 1. Mods and over can now use it >= 0 makes it so everyone can use it.

Read full topic
